CatDescriptText: Mr. W. Simpson, 1227 Ridge Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 15, 1958, pg. 2 with question: �Do you think that the numbers game should be legalized or outlawed?� answer reads: �I don�t play the numbers, but a lot of people do. Therefore, I think that they should be legalized for the sake of the people who play them.�
TitMainTitle: Portrait of W. Simpson, wearing light colored zippered jacket with collar and three zippered pockets and hat with dark embroidered strip above bill, standing in front of screen door and wood paneled wall with ribbed plastic sheeting
